CustomField.description: Evaluates data quality for contact fields.
CustomField.formula: IF (RecordType.Name = 'Ceilings Contact', IF( Data_Quality_Score__c =100,"All Contact Details Captured", "Missing: " &IF( LEN( Phone ) = 0, "Phone, ","")&"" &IF(LEN( Email) = 0, "Email, ","")&"" &IF( LEN( MailingStreet ) = 0, "Complete Address, ","")&"" &IF( LEN(Title) = 0, "Job Title, ","")&"" &IF( ISPICKVAL( Contact_Relationship__c ,""), "Status","")) &IF( LEN( ReportsToId ) = 0, "Reports To, ","")&"" , IF( Data_Quality_Score__c =100,"All Contact Details Captured", "Missing: " &IF( ISPICKVAL(Contact_Type__c ,""), "Contact Type, ","") &IF( ISPICKVAL(Role_Type__c ,""), "Role Type, ","") &IF( AND( LEN( Email)= 0, Does_Not_Have_Email__c = FALSE), "Email, ","")&"" &IF( LEN(Title) = 0, "Title, ","")) )
CustomField.label: Data Quality Description
